description: ff. 8. 180 x 134; 138 x 97 mm. 23 lin. cop. by Ibn Ṭūlūn al-Ṣāliḥī, Dhū al-Qaʻdah 922. On the characteristics of Abū Bakr, ʻUmar,ʻUthmān, ʻAlī , ḥasan, and ḥusayn: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 84 (14: no. 1); S II, 76. Incip.: ... قال ... الحمد لله الذى طهر قلوب اهل السنة
